channel.title: Different way to run the client? CODE!
channel.description:
Alright, i have the matrix 667 client i believe, but it has this code to run the client.
@echo off @title "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Dfile.encoding=Cp1252 -classpath bin;lib/libs.jar;lib/graphics.jar; Loader pause
I want to make it to were people don't have to have jre7 to play my server, so i'm trying to get a code that works without anyone installing anything.
PLEASE HELP!!!

item.title: Different way to run the client? CODE!
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

Well first of all, you HAVE to have JRE7. JRE6 and lower won’t work.

Read full topic
item.source: Different way to run the client? CODE!

item.title: Different way to run the client? CODE!
item.dc:creator: @PureQuintinScape PureQuintinScape
item.description:
@PureQuintinScape wrote:

Alright, i have the matrix 667 client i believe, but it has this code to run the client.

@echo off
@title
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe” -Dfile.encoding=Cp1252 -classpath bin;lib/libs.jar;lib/graphics.jar; Loader
pause

I want to make it to were people don’t have to have jre7 to play my server, so i’m trying to get a code that works without anyone installing anything.

PLEASE HELP!!!

Read full topic
